reviews.review_msg: Tiffany is awesome and makes the class really interesting and engaging. I've seen more people participate in this class than any of my others due to her genuine, friendly and clear lecture style.

Fantastic professor! Approachable, understanding, knowledgeable, and inspiring! She is so articulate and well versed in teaching that her lectures are intriguing and unfold like the stories she is so passionate about. Offers invaluable critical thinking skills. Gorgeous too! A business student, I found my true calling in English thanks to her! :')

Hits all of the notes well in lecture. He sometimes got hung up on a certain poem or excerpt for too long and had to rush the last bit of the lecture but that's fine. One of the only people who I've heard read poetry and not make me cringe. The final is fine if you attend lecture regularly and go over the exam review sheets.
